overview: Two classic beauties, the man who stands between them, Brett must choose between her lover, the effervescent, sultry Mia or the man she's agreed to marry. Riley finds out that her classmate Bonnie is secretly a pornstar! She invites Bonnie over to confront her about it, but Bonnie doesn't give a shit if people know! Taylor is a good little worker, but she keeps getting distracted by her coworker Jayden's slutty behavior with the other girls. Nikki is busted and sent to the slammer where she is interrogated by officer Kirsten. Kendra Lust discovered her neighbors were a pair of glamorous lesbians. When Rachel and Phoenix catch her in the act of spying, they barge right into the room and have her join in!
title: Hot and Mean 11
